parameters.prompt: synthwave, nostalgic, melancholic, pulsing bass, shimmering arpeggios, vintage drum machine, cinematic
parameters.lyrics: [verse] City lights blur through the rain, neon ghosts in the taxi lane, I still hear your voice in the static hum, a broken signal from where we’d begun [chorus] We were echoes in a hollow room, dancing shadows chasing the moon, now the tape’s worn thin, but I press rewind, to the nights we left in the afterglow’s shine [verse] Your number’s faded on my palm, like a relic from a midnight psalm, I dial the stars but they don’t reply, just the hum of the wires and a half-remembered goodbye [chorus] We were echoes in a hollow room, dancing shadows chasing the moon, now the tape’s worn thin, but I press rewind, to the nights we left in the afterglow’s shine [bridge] The jukebox skips on our favorite song, a glitch in time where we still belong, if I close my eyes, we’re 17—headlights carving dreams on a silver screen [outro] The dawn’s a VHS bleed, rewinding you back to me, but the screen just snows…
